00028     template<typename T>
00029     int getsockopt(level lev, option opt, T& optval)
00030     {
00031         int ret;
00032         size_t siz = sizeof(T);
00033         if((ret=::getsockopt(_sd,lev,opt,&optval,&siz)) < 0)
00034             throw error("getsockopt",errno,"getsockopt");
00035         return ret;
00036     }
00037 
00043     template<typename T>
00044     int setsockopt(level lev, option opt, const T& optval) 
00045     {
00046         int ret;
00047         if((ret=::setsockopt(_sd,lev,opt,&optval,sizeof(T))) < 0)
00048             throw error("setsockopt",errno,"setsockopt");
00049         return ret;
00050     }
